sources.title: Dick Tracy (1937)
sources.description: Dick Tracy's foe for this serial is the crime boss and Masked Mystery Villain The Spider/The Lame One and his Spider Ring. In the process of various crimes, including using his Flying wing and sound weapon to destroy the Bay Bridge in San Francisco and stealing an experimental "Speed Plane", the Spider captures Dick Tracy's brother, Gordon. The Spider's minion, Dr. Moloch, performs a brain operation on Gordon Tracy to turn him evil, making him secretly part of the Spider Ring and so turning brother against brother. Watch on RetroFlix:¬† https://retroflix.org/dick-tracy-1937/

sources.title: Dick Tracy (1937) 15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGERüçïRALPH BYRD
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Ralph Byrd, Kay Hughes, Smiley Burnette, Francis X. Bushman
Writer: Chester Gould (comic strip by)
Directors:  Alan James & Ray Taylor
Ralph Byrd stars as the granite-jawed detective, DICK TRACY, who battles a master criminal known as the Spider. 
üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:09     CHAPTER 1:  The Spider Strikes
30:46     CHAPTER 2:  The Bridge of Terror
50:03     CHAPTER 3:  The Fur Pirates
1:10:34  CHAPTER 4:  Death Rides the Sky
1:31:29  CHAPTER 5:  Brother Against Brother
1:50:48  CHAPTER 6:  Dangerous Waters
2:07:45  CHAPTER 7:  The Ghost Town Mystery
2:28:02  CHAPTER 8:  Battle in the Clouds

3:23:28  CHAPTER 11: Harbor Pursuit
3:40:10  CHAPTER 12: The Trail of the Spider
3:57:48  CHAPTER 13: The Fire Trap
4:14:39  CHAPTER 14: The Devil in White
4:35:20  CHAPTER 15: Brothers United

sources.title: Dick Tracy 1937 colorized serial feature (Ralph Byrd)
sources.description: Adaptation of the Chester Gould comic strip in which a master criminal known as The Spider has the mind of the famous detective's brother altered so as to turn him against Dick. 15-chapter cliffhanger serial Ralph Byrd as Dick Tracy Kay Hughes as Gwen Andrews Smiley Burnette as Mike McGurk Lee Van Atta as Junior John Picorri as Moloch Carleton Young as Gordon Tracy Fred Hamilton as Steve Lockwood Francis X. Bushman as Chief Clive Anderson I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.

metadata.Plot: A master criminal called The Spider puts the famous detective's brother under a hypnotic spell and turns him against Dick.
metadata.Writer: Chester Gould, Barry Shipman, Winston Miller
metadata.Actors: Ralph Byrd, Kay Hughes, Smiley Burnette
